title: Edited for readability
description: The reference guide has a lot of detail, so I have edited much of it to make it more readable and hence more useful. My contribution to an excellent effort.

replies.body:
Hi Gezzed,

thanks a lot.
Curiously, we have native speaker for Spanish, French, Russian and Chinese version of OX doc, but not for the English version. So, your help is very useful.

Thanks again!
